dict.string:
This disables ALL pop-ups system wide which 'some' AppStore apps also use for forced updates (however don't expect it to work for all apps). You can use this to test if an app's older version still works without updating it. If it does... than you can re-create this patch for said app or try manually altering the app's info.plist versions etc.
⚠️WARNING: This disables ALL systemwide pop-ups using this method so ONLY enable/use this patch to test if an outdated app version still works.
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 8.4 (8-25-15)
⚑ UPDATES: (3-1-15) *Initial release (8-25-15) *Changed title & confirmed working on 8.4
★ If you'd like to donate via PayPal, please send money to...
☞ goin730@gmail.com
Alerts • No Pop-Ups (Forced Update Tester for AppStore Apps) ₈₋₂₅₋₁₅
